asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.

activationMode.description:
The activation mode for the preview element.

- "focus" - Enter edit mode when the preview is focused
- "dblclick" - Enter edit mode when the preview is double-clicked
- "click" - Enter edit mode when the preview is clicked
- "none" - Edit can be triggered programmatically only

autoResize.description: Whether the editable should auto-resize to fit the content.

defaultEdit.description: Whether the editable is in edit mode by default.

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the editable when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the value of the editable.

edit.description: Whether the editable is in edit mode.

finalFocusEl.description: The element to receive focus when the editable is closed.

form.description: The associate form of the underlying input.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  area: string
  label: string
  preview: string
  input: string
  control: string
  submitTrigger: string
  cancelTrigger: string
  editTrigger: string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the editable. Useful for composition.

invalid.description: Whether the input's value is invalid.

maxLength.description: The maximum number of characters allowed in the editable

name.description: The name attribute of the editable component. Used for form submission.

onEditChange.description: Function to call when the edit mode changes.

onFocusOutside.description: Function called when the focus is moved outside the component

onInteractOutside.description: Function called when an interaction happens outside the component

onPointerDownOutside.description: Function called when the pointer is pressed down outside the component

onValueChange.description: Function to call when the value changes.

onValueCommit.description: Function to call when the value is committed.

onValueRevert.description: Function to call when the value is reverted.

placeholder.description: The placeholder text for the editable.

selectOnFocus.description: Whether to select the text in the input when it is focused.

submitMode.description:
The action that triggers submit in the edit mode:

- "enter" - Trigger submit when the enter key is pressed
- "blur" - Trigger submit when the editable is blurred
- "none" - No action will trigger submit. You need to use the submit button
- "both" - Pressing `Enter` and blurring the input will trigger submit

value.description: The controlled value of the editable.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
